company_context: One platform to connect | Zoom It’s here: Zoom AI Companion 3.0 Learn more Try it now It’s here: Zoom AI Companion 3.0 Learn more Try it now It’s here: Zoom AI Companion 3.0 Learn more Try it now Find out what's possible when work connects Whether you're chatting with teammates or supporting customers, Zoom makes it easier to connect, collaborate, and reach goals — all with built-in AI doing the heavy lifting. Explore products Find your plan Meetings AI Companion Team Chat Phone Whiteboard Webinar Docs Zoom Rooms Virtual Agent Clips Contact Center Introducing Zoom AI Companion 3.0 AI Companion does more than save you time. It captures context, uncovers insights, and helps you deliver better work. Learn more Zoom AI Companion helps by: Capturing and summarizing conversations wherever your meeting takes place. Turning meeting notes and insights into ready-to-use docs, briefs, and more. Automating prep, follow-up, and documentation so you can focus on impact. "It always comes down to 'I want to work on my business, not in my business.' Zoom AI Companion allows me to have that time back to do the work that only I can do." Nancy Koziol Founder, couch + cork A Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for UCaaS, Worldwide 2025. 6th year in a row! And with AI built in, every interaction is faster, easier, and more productive. Unify how teams connect: Meetings, Phone, Chat, and more are all in one UCaaS platform, so communication feels seamless. Consolidate your tools: Replace scattered apps with an all-in-one solution that saves time, reduces costs, and keeps work in sync. Support hybrid and remote work: Keep even global teams engaged with reliable video conferencing, persistent chat, shared docs, and more. Keep workflows moving: From brainstorms to docs to quick check-ins, Zoom helps teams cut friction and avoid projects stalling. Do more with AI: Built-in AI summarizes meetings, drafts follow-ups, and shares next steps, so your team spends more time creating. Get started Solve customer issues faster and deliver a seamless experience across every channel with AI-first contact center and CX solutions. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi Sarah, this is Alex from DeepData AI. I'm reaching out because we help companies like yours leverage their data more effectively, particularly in areas like streamlining complex workflows and extracting actionable insights. Is this a good time to chat briefly?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (Sighs) Alex, I'm CTO at a company that's already heavily invested in AI. We're talking to Zoom about their new AI Companion 3.0, and frankly, my plate is overflowing with integration and evaluation tasks. What exactly is it you offer that would warrant my time right now?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand, Sarah. It sounds like you're already at the forefront of AI adoption, which is great. Our focus at DeepData AI isn't necessarily to replicate what a platform like Zoom AI Companion is doing at the user interaction level, but rather to provide a robust foundation for your data that powers *all* your AI initiatives. Think of it as the engine that fuels multiple AI applications, ensuring the data fed into them is clean, structured, and ready for in-depth analysis.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: "Clean, structured, and ready for in-depth analysis." That's a nice marketing phrase, Alex. We have data engineers and a whole infrastructure in place to handle that. We ingest, process, and analyze data constantly. What makes DeepData AI so different or better than what we've already built or are about to build with other leading platforms?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a fair question, Sarah. Many companies have invested heavily in data infrastructure, and it's a testament to your team's forward-thinking. Where we often see a gap, even with sophisticated setups, is in the *speed* and *scalability* of complex data transformations, especially as data volumes explode and new AI models require more granular, contextualized data. DeepData AI specializes in accelerating those transformations and uncovering deeper, more nuanced insights that might be missed with traditional processing. We can handle unstructured data, fuzzy matching, and predictive data enrichment at a scale that often becomes a bottleneck for in-house solutions.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: So, you're saying your "engine" is faster than ours. Look, we're about to roll out a major integration with Zoom. My priority is ensuring that works seamlessly and delivers the promised efficiencies for our teams. I'm not looking to rip out or overhaul our existing data pipelines right now. Can you offer anything that *complements* our current strategy without requiring a massive overhaul?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, Sarah, and that's precisely how we position DeepData AI. It's designed to augment your existing infrastructure, not replace it. We can integrate with your current data sources and processing layers, acting as an intelligent accelerator for specific, high-value data tasks. For instance, if your Zoom AI Companion is identifying key discussion points, DeepData AI can enrich that information with external market data, customer historical interactions, or other proprietary datasets in real-time to provide a more comprehensive picture for your business decisions. It's about adding a layer of intelligence and speed to the data that *already exists* and is flowing through your systems.
